product.title: Calder Porcelain - Roman Blind
product.description: Transform your home by adding the subtle colour and eye-catching arrangement of the calder in porcelain. This handsome blind is made from a cotton fresh fabric to form a serene feel with a contemporary style. Create a humble and sophisticated look in your master bedroom by combining the porcelain with a soft palette and modern designs. Develop the chalky blue or muted sage green shades with correlating fabrics and cushions, formed on a base of subdued grey for tranquil and elegant feel.

relproducts.title: Stirlo Porcelain White
relproducts.description: Stirloporcelain whiteplain roller blind the stirlo range boast a fantastic range of dim-out privacy fabrics to compliment any room. The fabric is composed of 100% polyester and is rolled around a strong, rust free aluminium tube. The blind is supplied with a premium control mechanism with white chain used as standard, or a nickel metal chain can be chosen above to upgrade. Supplied with the blinds are installation instructions and universal brackets suitable for top, side and face fixing.

relproducts.title: Ecowood Porcelain Grey Fine Grain - Venetian Blind
relproducts.description: The natural grain finish of the ecowood in porcelain grey fine grain makes it perfect for adding the look of authentic painted wood to your home. The silky grey tone is sweet and subtle, as well as completely versatile, matching a wide range of styles and colour schemes. Insert the porcelain grey fine grain into a light decor scheme for a lounge, furnishing the room with white painted wickers, luxe grey fabrics, and minimal metal.

relproducts.title: Konya Blackout Porcelain White
relproducts.description: Konya blackoutporcelain whiteplain roller blind the konya range boasts a huge range of blackout and thermal fabrics to use in any room. The fabric is composed of 100% polyester, with a pvc blackout backing and is rolled around a strong, rust free aluminium tube. The blind is supplied with a premium control mechanism with white chain used as standard, or a nickel metal chain can be chosen above to upgrade.

relproducts.title: Ecowood Porcelain Grey Satin - Venetian Blind
relproducts.description: The ecowood in porcelain grey satin is a pretty yet unassuming piece in a pale dove grey and with a smooth, silky finish. This attractive blind is practical and durable, as well as offering style and sophistication to any room in the home. As for the colour? It matches everything. Give your lounge a contemporary makeover by opting for an ultra-trendy yellow and grey colour scheme. Paint one wall in a sunny yellow tone and the others in a soft white.

relproducts.title: Verona Blackout Porcelain Roller Blind
relproducts.description: Light, bright and simple, this stunning off white roller blind has a hint of neutral for added warmth and some great practical features too. The sleek, smooth look is a great match for that stunning shade, with its effortless sidewinder control making it as easy to use as it is t light, bright and simple, this stunning off white roller blind has a hint of neutral for added warmth and some great practical features too.

relproducts.title: Ecowood Deluxe Porcelain Grey Fine Grain - Venetian Blind
relproducts.description: There's no colour with quite the versatile sophistication of grey, and the ecowood deluxe range's porcelain grey fine grain doesn't let it down. A realistic grain texture sits across the slats, which offer contemporary clean lines as well as practical durability. Coordinate the porcelain grey fine grain with a rich mauve for a stunningly pretty, yet clean and contemporary, look in the guest bedroom.

relproducts.title: Alessi Porcelain Roller Blind
relproducts.description: Using a mix of matt and sheen threads to create a two tone pattern giving a touch of luxury to a room. Alessi porcelain roller blind available from leading blinds supplier kingston blinds direct. Order a free sample and get an instant price online.

relproducts.title: Langden Porcelain - Roman Blind
relproducts.description: A light version of cornflower blue, the porcelain features the typical langden patterning, a paisley-inspired delight with a pretty, vintage twist. Combined with the luxury of the roman shape, this sweet pattern is sure to add softness and lightness to any room.
